## PR-METADATA
```yaml
yai_pr: 1
type: twin-pr
issue: "#<issue-number>|N/A"
mp: "MP-<TRACK>-<X.Y.Z>|N/A"
runbook: "docs/runbooks/<name>.md|N/A"
base_commit: "<40-char-sha>"
compatibility: "A|B|C"
scope: "cross-repo change"
repos_impacted: ["yai", "yai-cli", "yai-specs"]
twin_prs:
  yai_cli: "<link>|N/A"
  yai_specs: "<link>|N/A"
```

## Objective

One cross-repo objective.

## Twin PR links (required)

- yai-cli PR:
- yai-specs PR:

## Sequencing

- Merge order:
- Pin/bump steps:

## Evidence (cross-repo)

- yai:
- yai-cli:
- yai-specs (if applicable):

## Commands run

```bash
# paste exact commands across repos
```

## Checklist

- [ ] Links are real (no placeholders)
- [ ] Merge order declared
- [ ] Evidence covers both sides of the boundary
